items.title: Jimmy Carter will have funeral services in Plains, Ga., Atlanta and Washington, D.C.
items.description: Former President Jimmy Carter's state funeral services will span six days, three cities and multiple places of significance from his life.

items.title: In Jimmy Carter's hometown of Plains, people remember the former president
items.description: People in Plains, Ga., are remembering former President Jimmy Carter who died on Sunday at the age of 100. Carter embraced his hometown and never forg...

items.title: Photos: Former President Carter redefined post-presidency role
items.description: The Nobel Peace Prize winner devoted himself to improving the health of people around the world, promoting democracy and resolving global conflicts.
